description: Check to see if any users have the SAP_INTERNAL_HANA_SUPPORT role

queries.name: q_users_sap_hana_internal_support
queries.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM SYS.EFFECTIVE_ROLE_GRANTEES WHERE ROLE_NAME = 'SAP_INTERNAL_HANA_SUPPORT'

actions.description: At least one account has the SAP_INTERNAL_HANA_SUPPORT role. This is an internal role that enables low level access to data. It should only be assigned to admin or support at the request of SAP Development and during an active SAP support request.
